name: Link Archiver
description: Automatically archives links posted to Mattermost channels. Supports multiple archival methods configurable by hostname and MIME type rules.

settings_schema.header: Configure the Link Archiver plugin. Set up archival rules to specify which archival tool to use based on hostname and/or MIME type patterns.

settings.help_text: Configure archival rules that match on hostname and/or MIME type patterns. Rules are evaluated in order, and the first matching rule determines which archival tool to use. Use wildcards like '*.example.com' for hostnames or 'image/*' for MIME types.
